name: Starship Turret Operator Guy Free
description:
Intense shoot 'em up (shmup) action awaits you in this top down retro inspired space defense game!

Blast asteroids, pirates and space junk as you defend wave after wave of incoming hostile threats while upgrading your turret, blasting enemies, firing bombs and unlocking tower expansions!

Packed with upgrades this challenging retro inspired shooter will keep you entertained.

FEATURES:
• Intense Shooting Arcade Action
• Tons of Upgrades and 4 Unique Expansion Towers
• Special Items Pickups and Secret Shops
• Advanced Scoring System that will keep skilled shooter fans engaged!
• Beautiful HD graphics and more!
• iPad and iPhone ready!

If you enjoy this, you will LOVE the FULL VERSION, ad free Starship Turret Operator Guy game with unlimited waves, unique game modes and more!
